title: Gumshoe Goddess and the Catskill Caper
description: A dead guy, a dead bug and a Latin Quarter matchbook is the catalyst that brings the Gumshoe Goddess and NYPD Detective, Jack Chit, together for the Catskill Caper.After scientist Jay Barrett discovers an anti-aging formula someone immediately and horrifically torches his apartment. Within the rubble a charred body is found.The police are clueless, therefore, NYPD detective Jack Chit is told to chill when the case freezes over.The company that the scientist worked for, Cavu Cosmetics, want their chemist found. Jack recommends, Lucky May, a savvy stiletto wearing private investigator from Manhattan, known to her friends as the Gumshoe Goddess.Lucky gets frustrated that there aren't any clues to follow and is about to give up on the missing scientist when a key suddenly appears and begins to unlock the mystery.
author: S. McKane
